reviews.text:
This is on the Atlantic Coast line between Par and Newquay and is a request stop and is the first stop after leaving Par

Single line track and a single platform and the service reflects this

Service operated by Great Western Railway - and was reliable on all the times I used it

K3 is the timetable which is available on line or at local stations

Arrived here late at night and hence the reason why there are no photographs 

Staff on the train are pleasant and polite and as all the stops bar two are request stops then they will always come up and down and sell tickets and ask where you will be getting off

As with all request stops please remember the following -:
1) If you are on the train and wish to alight/get off then always tell the conductor or guard (communicates with the driver)
2) getting on the train at a request stop - ensure you are visible to the driver who will stop to let you on

Plenty of space on the train for bikes
